item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 2, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Intel Announces Retirement of CEO Pat Gelsinger (135 points | 70 comments)
2. Kenya and "The Decline of the Greatest Coffee" (2021) (3 points | discuss)
3. Show HN: Visualizing website carbon footprints using steam and robotics [video] (10 points | 1 comment)
4. KlongPy: High-Performance Array Programming in Python (8 points | discuss)
5. Show HN: Markwhen: Markdown for Timelines (577 points | 62 comments)
6. The GNU make jobserver Implementation (2015) (57 points | 19 comments)
7. What Will Enter the Public Domain in 2025? (264 points | 210 comments)
8. An Aperiodic Monotile (2023) (39 points | 14 comments)
9. Gene behind orange fur in cats found at last (162 points | 67 comments)
10. How to Study Mathematics (2017) (160 points | 63 comments)
11. What happens if we remove 50 percent of Llama? (101 points | 65 comments)
12. Ask HN: How can I grow as an engineer without good seniors to learn from? (296 points | 185 comments)
13. When was the famous "sudo warning" introduced? (2019) (130 points | 97 comments)
14. Procedural knowledge in pretraining drives reasoning in large language models (209 points | 80 comments)
15. Kubernetes on Hetzner: cutting my infra bill by 75% (332 points | 180 comments)
16. Bicameral, Not Homoiconic (65 points | 32 comments)

18. Advent of Code 2024 (1206 points | 479 comments)
19. Ryugu asteroid sample colonized by terrestrial life despite strict control (70 points | 36 comments)
20. Francis Crick's "Central Dogma" was misunderstood (110 points | 53 comments)
21. 1/0 = 0 (2018) (99 points | 161 comments)
22. Vulkan Video Now Enabled by Default for Radeon VCN2/VCN3 Hardware on Linux (9 points | discuss)
23. Show HN: Steel.dev – An open-source browser API for AI agents and apps (86 points | 31 comments)
24. CapibaraZero: A cheap alternative to FlipperZero based on ESP32-S3 (13 points | 1 comment)
25. Thinking in Actors – Challenging your software modelling to be simpler (76 points | 28 comments)
26. Intel gets up to $7.9B award for U.S. chip-plant construction (118 points | 170 comments)
27. The Color of Noise (2014) (68 points | 10 comments)
28. LaTeX.css – Make your website look like a LaTeX document (125 points | 29 comments)
29. Heaviside’s Operator Calculus (2007) (73 points | 23 comments)
30. Cursed Linear Types in Rust (92 points | 20 comments)
